item.title: 2025 LLM Timeline
item.description:
I built an interactive timeline that lines up major OpenAI and Google Gemini launches, plus the most likely release windows for their next models. It pulls together public rumors, official roadmaps, and the cadence from last year to make side-by-side comparisons easier.

Explore the full interactive timeline to see both tracks, hover for details, and skim the upcoming milestones.
